name: The Haunting of Marybeth
description:
This is a short(and I mean short) and small low poly horror game where the player takes the role of a police officer called in to investigate a domestic disturbance, only to find all the lights off, doors locked, and silence. What's going on here?

Controls:

WASD to move, shift to sprint, mouse 1 to fire, number keys for weapon selection, mouse 2 to read and stop reading certain items, r to return to menu, and esc to pause.

This started as a three week fun side project.
